element.name: ACN System/Company Providing ACN Data
element.definition: The agency providing the Automated Collision Notification (ACN) Data.
element.v3Comment: Based on Vehicular Emergency Data Set: Provider Name. Vehicular Emergency Data Set (VEDS) Recommendations. Version 3.0 Prepared: (February 2011) by the Advanced Automatic Crash Notification (AACN) Joint APCO/NENA Data Standardization Working Group.
element.v3Changes: Added to better incorporate advanced automated collision notification information.
